message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to both of us, I propose a price of $11,000 for it. This price reflects the quality and benefits the product offers, while still leaving room for negotiation. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $10,500.  Considering the product's value to me, I'm willing to pay $10,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer. For $10,750, I believe we can reach an agreement that respects the value of the product to both parties. I look forward to your response.
Alice,  $10,750 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $10,600, but that's my final offer.  Let's make this deal happen.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product for $10,650. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a reasonable negotiation. I hope this proposal will lead to a satisfactory conclusion.
Alice, I'm very close to my limit, but I'm willing to go up to $10,550. This is my final offer.  If we can't agree on this, I'll need to consider other options.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a final counteroffer of $10,575. I believe this price respects the value of the product and your budget. I hope this will be the last step towards reaching an agreement.
